health_recipes.name: Banana Pancake
instructions: Mash the banana in a bowl.
Whisk in the eggs until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and cook small pancakes for 1–2 minutes per side

health_recipes.name: Fruit Yogurt Bowl
instructions: Scoop yogurt into a bowl.
Top with your choice of fruit.
Enjoy as a refreshing snack!

health_recipes.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slice.
Spread mashed avocado on top and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Optional: Add a poached egg for extra protein.

health_recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Mix cooked quinoa with chopped vegetables.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss well and serve chilled or at room temperature.

health_recipes.name: Spinach and Egg Scramble
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté spinach until wilted.
Add beaten eggs and cook, stirring, until scrambled.
Serve hot with whole-grain toast.

fast_foods.name: Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta in a large pot of salted water for 8-10 minutes or until al dente
Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Serve hot with optional grated Parmesan cheese.

fast_foods.name: Loaded Cheese Fries
instructions: Bake or fry the French fries according to the package instructions.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the hot fries and let it melt.
Top with bacon bits or green onions for extra flavor.

fast_foods.name: Hot Dog Roll-Ups
instructions: Wrap each sausage with a strip of crescent roll dough
Bake at 375°F (190°C) until golden brown (about 12 minutes)
Serve with ketchup or mustard

fast_foods.name: Masala Maggie

ingredients.name: red chili powder or garam masala

instructions: Cook the Maggi noodles with the tastemaker as per the package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions with a bit of oil and add chili powder or garam masala.
Mix the cooked noodles with the spiced onions and serve hot.

fast_foods.name: Pizza Wrap
instructions: Spread pizza sauce over the tortilla.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
Fold the tortilla in half and heat it in a pan until the cheese melts.
